description: An artwork by Jean-Michel Basquiat sold for a record $110.
title: Basquiat painting fetches record $110.5 million at New York auction

author: BBC News
description: A painting by the late New York artist Jean-Michel Basquiat breaks several price records.
title: Basquiat painting breaks records at $110.5m in New York

author: Katya Kazakina
description: An untitled portrait by Jean Michel-Basquiat sold for $110.5 million at Sotheby’s in New York, setting a record for any American artist. The buyer was Japanese online retail magnate Yusaku Maezawa.
title: Basquiat Portrait Soars to Record $110 Million at Sotheby's

description: NEW YORK (AP) — A 1982 artwork by Jean-Michel Basquiat sold for a record $110.5 million at Sotheby's auction of contemporary art Thursday night. Sotheby's said the sale of "Untitled" was an auction record for the artist. It also set a record price for an American artist at auction. The painting's graffiti-like typography depicts a face in the shape of a skull. The piece was purchased by noted Japanese collector and e-commerce entrepreneur Yusaku Maezawa after a 10-minute bidding war.
title: Basquiat painting fetches record $110.5M at New York auction
